body.name: Piel del Sol Alcohol-Free Facial Toner for Exfoliation, Intensive Hydration with Natural Antioxidants for Skin Regeneration, Ideal for All Skin Types, and Soothing & Revitalizing Face Toner 98 ml
body.stockDetail: Only 5 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 23 mins
features: EFECTIVE EXFOLIATION: Our toner employs a gentle yet effective exfoliation process, helping to remove dull, dead skin cells and reveal a smoother, more radiant complexion. By promoting cellular turnover, it aids in reducing the appearance of fine lines and imperfections, resulting in a revitalized and youthful look.

INTENSIVE HYDRATION: Infused with powerful hydrating agents, this toner penetrates deep into your skin, providing an intensive burst of moisture. You'll feel an immediate difference as dryness is quenched, leaving your skin supple and dewy. Say goodbye to dry, flaky skin with our hydrating formula.

NATURAL ANTIOXIDANTS: Our toner is rich in natural antioxidants, derived from carefully selected ingredients. These antioxidants help protect your skin from environmental stressors and free radicals, supporting its overall health and vitality. Your skin will thank you as it looks and feels more youthful and resilient.

SOOTHING AND ANTI-IRRITATION PROPERTIES: Experience the soothing embrace of our toner as it gently calms your skin, reducing redness and irritation. Whether you have sensitive skin or need relief after exposure to harsh environmental conditions, this toner's anti-irritation properties will provide a sense of comfort and balance.

SUPPORTS SKIN REGENERATION: Our toner not only nourishes your skin but also supports its natural regeneration process. As it encourages the growth of healthy new skin cells, you'll notice improved texture and a more even complexion. With consistent use, your skin will appear revitalized and youthful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gotta say, this facial toner is a great! It's like a refreshing splash of goodness for my face. Lol. My skin feels so alive and revitalized after using it.The natural antioxidants are doing wonders. It's like a mini spa day for my face every time I use this toner and the soothing effect is a bonus!!Honestly, I've tried a few toners, but this one is a keeper. If you want something that's kind to your skin and brings back that fresh feeling, try this one! It's like a little bottle of happy for your face!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Subtle light scent. Spray bottle, so I spray the cleaning pad not my face, because me being me it would probably end up everywhere except my face. It helps prevent break outs, removes oil. It's makes my skin soft and feels more hydrated.The must before makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your face feels so clean and fresh without the dryness of Alcohol
reviews.reviewText: This product is such a great toner. It smells wonderful and makes your face feel and look like every pore on your skin is cleaned out of gunk. My face feels hydrated without feeling sticky. There is no dry taut feeling like the toners that are alcohol based. I love the spray feature as it makes sure your product stays clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: My daughter Loves this stuff. She says it makes her skin feel great, and controls the oil so she has less breakouts.
